verbose_text: Georges et al. and Braun et al. separately found that miR-192, miR-194, and miR-215 are induced by DNA damage in a p53 dependent manner [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], while Yan et al. identified the miR-17-92 cluster as a miRNA repressed by p53 under hypoxic conditions [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: miR-192, miR-194, and miR-215 are induced by DNA damage in a p53
